queries.long_query: Night Wandering activity takes place when a person moves between master bedroom and master bathroom and kitchen and office and living room and guest bathroom and hallway areas during nighttime hours with multiple transitions
Sedentary activity takes place when a person sits quietly in the living room armchair or office chair or dining table with minimal movement for extended periods
